item.title: PrivacySpy
item.description: PrivacySpy rates companies’ privacy policies on a ten-point scale, so you can easily understand how your data is being treated online. I started PrivacySpy with Igor Barakaiev in the summer of 2019. You can view the site at PrivacySpy.org, install the browser extension here, and view the source code on GitHub. The New York Times named PrivacySpy a “Tip of the Week” as part of its Privacy Project, writing: Privacy policies are long, boring and extremely consequential documents.
